title: Persist last task summary for progress line on resume
description: When resuming with --continue, the progress completion line (elapsed, tokens, cost) is blank because TaskSummary is in-memory only. Need to persist it in the session store (last_elapsed, last_input_tokens, last_output_tokens, last_cost, last_was_cancelled) and reconstruct TaskSummary on load.

logs.msg: Roadmap alignment 2026-02-12: useful UX follow-up, but not a Sprint 16 gate. Hold until tk-86lk closure.
Reprioritized 2026-02-12: unblocked from tk-86lk because resume-summary persistence can proceed independently of the RNK spike.
